      <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{A}}_{i}\,:=\sum_{{\alpha},{\beta}=1}^{N}{\textbf{A}}_{{\alpha}{\beta}%&#10;i}\ e^{\alpha}{\otimes}e^{\beta}\ \,\in\ {\mathbb{R}}_{s}^{N{\times}N}" text="[A] _ i assign ((sum _ (list@(alpha, beta) = 1)) ^ N)@(([A] _ (alpha * beta * i) * e ^ alpha) tensor-product e ^ beta) element-of (R _ s) ^ (N * N)" xml:id="S0.E4.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
            <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>

              </XMApp>

  <para xml:id="p6">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex2">

  <para xml:id="p17">
    <equation labels="LABEL:1.8" xml:id="S0.E9">
      <tags>
        <tag>(9)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 9</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">9</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{\smash{\overline{\mathbb{R}}}^{Mm}}\Phi(X)\,F\big{(}x,u(x),X\big{)}\,d[{%&#10;\mathcal{D}}u(x)](X)\,=\,0,\quad\text{ a.e. }x\in{\Omega}," text="formulae@((integral _ ((overline@(R)) ^ (M * m)))@(Phi * X * F * vector@(x, u * x, X) * d * delimited-[]@(D * u * x) * X) = 0, [ a.e. ] * x element-of Omega)" xml:id="S0.E9.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p32">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex16">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\Phi\ :\ E{\times}\smash{\overline{\mathbb{R}}}^{Mm}{\longrightarrow}{\mathbb{%&#10;R}},\quad(x,X)\mapsto\Phi(x,X)" text="Phi colon formulae@(E * (overline@(R)) ^ (M * m) longrightarrow R, open-interval@(x, X) maps-to Phi * open-interval@(x, X))" xml:id="S0.Ex16.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex20.m1.3">X</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
            <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMApp>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>

  <para xml:id="p38">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex22">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|\vartheta\|_{L^{\infty}_{w^{*}}(E,{\mathcal{M}}(\smash{\overline{\mathbb{R}}%&#10;}^{Mm}))}\,:=\,\underset{x\in E}{{\textrm{ess}}\,\sup}\,\left\|\vartheta(x)%&#10;\right\|\big{(}\smash{\overline{\mathbb{R}}}^{Mm}\big{)}." text="(norm@(vartheta)) _ ((L ^ infinity) _ (w ^ *) * open-interval@(E, M * (overline@(R)) ^ (M * m))) assign (x element-of E)@([ess] * supremum) * norm@(vartheta * x) * (overline@(R)) ^ (M * m)" xml:id="S0.Ex22.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex22.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex22.m1.5">
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex22.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="vartheta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex22.m1.3">ϑ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex22.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex22.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex22.m1.1">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

    <equation labels="LABEL:2.11" xml:id="S0.E17">
      <tags>
        <tag>(17)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 17</tag>

                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S0.E20.m1.1">Π</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                          <XMWrap>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP" rpadding="5.0pt" xml:id="S0.E20.m1.8">⊆</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E20.m1.9">R</XMTok>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex36">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\mathscr{W}^{1,2}\Big{(}(0,T){\times}{\mathbb{R}}^{n},{\mathbb{R}}^{N}\Big{)}=%&#10;\left\{\begin{array}[]{l}\big{(}u,\underline{G}(u)\big{)}\in\,L^{2}\Big{(}(0,T%&#10;)\!{\times}\!{\mathbb{R}}^{n},\,{\mathbb{R}}^{N}\!{\times}\Pi\Big{)}\,\Big{|}%&#10;\ \ \exists\ (u^{\nu})_{1}^{\infty}{\subseteq}\\&#10;W^{1,2}\Big{(}(0,T)\!{\times}{\mathbb{R}}^{n},{\mathbb{R}}^{N}\Big{)}:\,\left(%&#10;u^{\nu},\Pi\,{\underline{D}}u^{\nu}\right){-\!\!\!\!-\!\!\!\!\rightharpoonup}%&#10;\big{(}u,\underline{G}(u)\big{)}\\&#10;\text{weakly in }L^{2}\Big{(}(0,T)\!{\times}{\mathbb{R}}^{n},\,{\mathbb{R}}^{N%&#10;}\!{\times}\Pi\Big{)},\ \ \text{ as }\nu{\rightarrow}\infty\end{array}\!\!%&#10;\right\}." text="W ^ (list@(1, 2)) * open-interval@(open-interval@(0, T) * R ^ n, R ^ N) = set@(Array[[[(u,¯G(u))∈L2((0,T)×Rn,RN×Π)| ∃(uν)1∞⊆]], [[W1,2((0,T)×Rn,RN):(uν,Π¯Duν)--⇀(u,¯G(u))]], [list@([weakly in ] * L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(0, T) * R ^ n, R ^ N * Pi), [ as ] * nu) rightarrow infinity]])" xml:id="S0.Ex36.m1">

    <equation labels="LABEL:3.10" xml:id="S0.E26">
      <tags>
        <tag>(26)</tag>

        <tag role="refnum">26</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\left\{\ \ \ \begin{split}\displaystyle{\mathbb{R}}^{N+Nn}&amp;\displaystyle=\,{%&#10;\textrm{span}}\big{[}\Big{\{}E^{{\alpha}i}\,:\,{\alpha}=1,...,N,\,i=0,1,...,n%&#10;\Big{\}}\big{]},\\&#10;\displaystyle\Pi&amp;\displaystyle=\,{\textrm{span}}\big{[}\Big{\{}E^{{\alpha}0}\,%&#10;:\,{\alpha}=1,...,N\Big{\}}\big{]},\\&#10;\displaystyle N({\underline{\textbf{A}}})&amp;\displaystyle=\,{\textrm{span}}\big{%&#10;[}\Big{\{}E^{{\alpha}i}\,:\,{\alpha}=1,...,N,\,i=1,...,n\Big{\}}\big{]}.\end{%&#10;split}\right." xml:id="S0.E26.m1">

      <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{A}}_{i}\,\eta^{\alpha}\ =\ c^{(i){\alpha}}\,\eta^{\alpha},\ \ \ \ \ {%&#10;\alpha}\,=\,1,...,N," text="formulae@([A] _ i * eta ^ alpha = c ^ (i * alpha) * eta ^ alpha, alpha = list@(1, ldots, N))" xml:id="S0.Ex42.m1">

          <XMDual>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex43">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{{\gamma}=1}^{N}{\textbf{A}}_{{\beta}{\gamma}i}\,\eta^{\alpha}_{\gamma}\,%&#10;=\,c^{(i){\alpha}}\,\eta_{\beta}^{\alpha},\ \ \ \ \ {\alpha},{\beta}\,=\,1,...%&#10;,N," text="formulae@(((sum _ (gamma = 1)) ^ N)@([A] _ (beta * gamma * i) * (eta ^ alpha) _ gamma) = list@(c ^ (i * alpha) * (eta _ beta) ^ alpha, alpha), beta = list@(1, ldots, N))" xml:id="S0.Ex43.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p74">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex44">

    <equation labels="LABEL:3.16" xml:id="S0.E32">
      <tags>
        <tag>(32)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 32</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">32</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="N^{{\alpha}i}\,:=\,\eta^{\alpha}{\otimes}\left[\begin{array}[]{c}-c^{(i){%&#10;\alpha}}\\&#10;\hline e^{i}\end{array}\right]\,=\,\eta^{\alpha}{\otimes}\Big{(}\underset{%&#10;\quad\quad\ \ \ \ \widehat{\text{(1+i)-position}}}{\big{[}-c^{(i){\alpha}},0,.%&#10;..,0,1,0,...0\big{]}^{\top}}\Big{)}," text="N ^ (alpha * i) assign eta ^ alpha tensor-product delimited-[]@(Array[[- c ^ (i * alpha)], [e ^ i]]) = eta ^ alpha tensor-product (widehat@([(1+i)-position]))@((list@(- c ^ (i * alpha), 0, ldots, 0, 1, 0, ldots * 0)) ^ top)" xml:id="S0.E32.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E32.m1.12"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E32.m1.12">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>

  <para xml:id="p88">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex53">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\mathbb{W}_{\alpha}\,=\,\eta^{\alpha}{\otimes}{\textrm{span}}[\left\{\left[%&#10;\begin{array}[]{c}-c^{(i){\alpha}}\\&#10;\hline e^{i}\end{array}\right]\,:\ i=1,...,n\right\}]," text="W _ alpha = (eta ^ alpha tensor-product [span]) * delimited-[]@(conditional-set@(delimited-[]@(Array[[- c ^ (i * alpha)], [e ^ i]]), i = list@(1, ldots, n)))" xml:id="S0.Ex53.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex53.m1.6"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex53.m1.6">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
<!--  %**** String Line 500 **** -->                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>

  </para>

    <equation labels="LABEL:3.21ab" xml:id="S0.E41">
      <tags>
        <tag>(41)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 41</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">41</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\Big{\|}\Phi\big{(}{\underline{D}}^{1,h}u\big{)}&amp;%&#10;\displaystyle\Big{(}{\underline{\textbf{A}}}{\!:\!}{\underline{D}}^{1,h}u\,-\,%&#10;f\Big{)}\Big{\|}_{L^{1}(E)}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\leq\,\sqrt{|E|}\,\|\Phi\|_{C^{0}({\mathbb{R}}^{N+Nn})}\,\Big{\|%&#10;}{\underline{\textbf{A}}}{\!:\!}{\underline{D}}^{1,h}u\,-\,{\underline{\textbf%&#10;{A}}}{\!:\!}\underline{G}(u)\Big{\|}_{L^{2}((0,T){\times}{\mathbb{R}}^{n})}.%&#10;\end{split}" text="parallel-to@Phi@(@(underline@(D)) ^ (list@(1, h))@u@)@(@underline@([A])@colon@(underline@(D)) ^ (list@(1, h))@u@-@f@)@parallel-to _ (L ^ 1 * E)@less=@square-root@(absolute-value@(E))@parallel-to@Phi@parallel-to _ (C ^ 0 * R ^ (N + N * n))@conditional@underline@([A])@colon@(underline@(D)) ^ (list@(1, h))@u@-@underline@([A])@colon@underline@(G)@(@u@)@parallel-to _ (L ^ 2 * open-interval@(0, T) * R ^ n)@PERIOD" xml:id="S0.E41.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMWrap rule="Anything,">
              <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.1"/>
              <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.5.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.6"/>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.7"/>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.8"/>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.9" rpadding="-1.7pt"/>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.10" rpadding="-1.7pt"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E41.m1.11"/>

  <para xml:id="p112">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex67">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{\smash{\overline{\mathbb{R}}}^{N+Nn}}\Big{|}\Phi\big{(}\underline{X}\big%&#10;{)}\Big{(}{\underline{\textbf{A}}}{\!:\!}\underline{X}\,-\,f(\underline{x})%&#10;\Big{)}\Big{|}\,d\big{[}\underline{\mDu}(\underline{x})\big{]}(\underline{X})%&#10;\,=\,0,\ \ \ \text{ a.e.\ }\underline{x}\in E." xml:id="S0.Ex67.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMApp>
          <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
          <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
          <XMWrap>
            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
            <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex67.m1.1">
              <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
          </XMWrap>
          <XMWrap>
            <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
            <XMApp rpadding="-1.7pt">
              <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p119">
    <equation labels="LABEL:3.30a" xml:id="S0.E50">
      <tags>
        <tag>(50)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 50</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">50</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lim_{k{\rightarrow}\infty}\int_{E\cap\big{\{}\big{|}{\underline{D}}^{1,h_{\nu%&#10;_{k}}}u\big{|}\leq R\big{\}}}\Big{|}{\underline{\textbf{A}}}{\!:\!}{\underline%&#10;{D}}^{1,h_{\nu_{k}}}u(\underline{x})\,-\,f(\underline{x})\Big{|}\,d\underline{%&#10;x}\,=\,0," text="conditional@((limit _ (k rightarrow infinity))@(integral _ [E∩{|¯D1,hνku|≤R}]), underline@([A])) colon (underline@(D)) ^ (list@(1, h _ nu _ k)) * u * underline@(x) - conditional@(f * underline@(x), d * underline@(x)) = 0" xml:id="S0.E50.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E50.m1.7"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E50.m1.7">
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="-1.7pt">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="160%" meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="rightarrow" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex71">
      <Math mode="display" tex="E^{R}\,\ni\ \underline{x}\,{\longmapsto}\,\mathscr{L}_{\underline{x}}\cap%&#10;\overline{\mathbb{B}}_{R}(0)\ {\subseteq}\,{\mathbb{R}}^{N+Nn}." text="E ^ R contains underline@(x) longmapsto L _ (underline@(x)) intersection (overline@(B)) _ R * 0 subset-of-or-equals R ^ (N + N * n)" xml:id="S0.Ex71.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex71.m1.2"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex71.m1.2">

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP" rpadding="5.0pt">∋</XMTok>
                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                  <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="longmapsto" role="ARROW" rpadding="1.7pt">⟼</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="script" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p127">
    <equation labels="LABEL:3.33" xml:id="S0.E53">
      <tags>
        <tag>(53)</tag>

        <tag role="refnum">53</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\int_{E^{R}}\Big{|}{\underline{\textbf{A}}}:%&#10;\underline{G}(u)\,-\,f\Big{|}&amp;\displaystyle\leq\,|{\underline{\textbf{A}}}|%&#10;\int_{E^{R}}\Big{|}\text{T}^{R}\Big{(}\cdot,\Pi\,{\underline{D}}^{1,h_{\nu_{k}%&#10;}}u\Big{)}\,-\,\text{T}^{R}\big{(}\cdot,\underline{G}(u)\big{)}\Big{|}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\ \ \ \ +|{\underline{\textbf{A}}}|\int_{E^{R}}\Big{|}\text{T}^{%&#10;R}\big{(}\cdot,\underline{G}(u)\big{)}\,-\,\underline{G}(u)\Big{|}\ +\ o(1),%&#10;\end{split}" text="integral _ (E ^ R)@|@underline@([A])@colon@underline@(G)@(@u@)@-@f@|@less=@|@underline@([A])@|@integral _ (E ^ R)@|@[T] ^ R@(@cdot@,@Pi@(underline@(D)) ^ (list@(1, h _ nu _ k))@u@)@-@[T] ^ R@(@cdot@,@underline@(G)@(@u@)@)@|@quad@+@|@underline@([A])@|@integral _ (E ^ R)@|@[T] ^ R@(@cdot@,@underline@(G)@(@u@)@)@-@underline@(G)@(@u@)@|@+@o@(@1@)@PUNCT" xml:id="S0.E53.m1">
